$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Decades ago a coup d'état toppled
the kingdom of Niðavellir, and the
country fell to ruin.$k$pUntil recently, they would have been
completely unable to muster a force
large enough to invade a country.$k$p$EFace|Not long ago, a soldier seized the
throne by force. His name is Fáfnir,
and he is now their king.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|He must be incredibly strong...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|To accomplish such a feat, he
surely commands a strength
beyond anything known to us.$k$pThe people of Niðavellir hoped for
a righteous king, and they welcomed
Fáfnir's rule.$k$pThe fact that he was not dvergr
royalty didn't matter to the people.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|But the righteousness they thought
they saw in him didn't last long...$k$pAs quickly as he'd taken the throne,
he became a tyrant, subjugating his
people and invading other countries.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|And now his forces have finally
arrived in Askr...$k$pCould power possibly corrupt
a good heart so quickly?$k$pI hope it's not so simple...
That would be too sad.$k$p$Sbs150|
